In this example, we will describe step by step how to create multi-omics networks and sub-networks by kinetic cluster from multi-omics time course data.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(netOmics)
library(timeOmics)
```

# Case Study 1: HeLa Cells Cycling

```{r}
data("HeLa")
```
